author: Axios
title: Chicago mayor: Coronavirus is "devastating" black communities due to underlying conditions
description: Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot said on CBS News' "Face the Nation" that the reason coronavirus has a disproportionate impact on minority populations is because of the underlying medical conditions that have historically "plagued" communities of color. Why it ma…
content:
